description:
• Just your typical credits screen.
System Menu

There are two options in the System Menu

The system menu.
  • Main Menu Return to the main menu from any point in the game. If you are in the middle of a game, it will be auto-saved so you'll have the option of continuing later.
  • Verbose By default, the game will prompt you with what to do next and inform you of what your Pulls are worth. Once you have the hang of the game, you can disable Verbose to move things along a bit quicker.
How to Install the Game

Not sure how to sideload games onto your Playdate? Panic has you covered with easy to follow instructions.
